# showsUserLocationControl

**Interface Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the user location control is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
showsUserLocationControl?: boolean;
```

## Discussion

The default value is `false`.

## Enabling user location

- **showsUserLocation**: A Boolean value that determines whether to show the user’s location on the map.
- **tracksUserLocation**: A Boolean value that determines whether to center the map on the user’s location.
